name: MEC Soft Synthetic Rectangular Liner - Unisex
categories: Sleeping bags, sleeping pads, quilts and pillows
description:
Easier to wash than your sleeping bag. Slide this quick-drying liner inside your bag to keep odour and sweat from penetrating. Adds a little bit of warmth but mostly keeps your sleeping bag clean. It's also great as a sleep sheet in a hostel or anywhere the bedding looks less than pristine.Made of lightweight polyester knit with a brushed, soft finish.Side snap opening at the top.Back panel folds over to create a pillow pocket.Includes an integrated stuff sack.

        Sustainability
